name: JetForcer | The Smartest Force.com IDE
description:
JetForcer is the smartest Force.com IDE for handy Salesforce development with JetBrains IDEs.
To be more precise, JetForcer is a plugin that should be installed in any JetBrains IDE. Together they are the best tool for Force.com development.

Resources:

  • For complete details about all available features read Features description on the plugin site.
  • Learn how to get started with JetForcer on the Quick Start Guide page.
  • To submit technical issues visit our bug tracking system.

JetForcer is a paid plugin with a free 30-day trial available. Read more about Pricing and Purchasing options on the purchase page.
Follow us on Twitter and Facebook to be notified about updates, new features, and other interesting facts about the JetForcer plugin.
notes:
• BugFix:
    • JF-2225 Can't run unit test on SFDX project without scratch org
    • JF-2115 Generating built-in stubs failing when creating new project in PHPStorm 2020.2.3
    • JF-2226 DX: Trying to deploy multiple files to non-tracked org lead to "ERROR: This command doesn't support wildcards. Remove the wildcard, and run the command again."
